title: new inspiration keystone!
body: riot probably already has plans but what would You like to see as a utility keystone?

replies.body:
Something that isn't OP on Vayne plz....

Basically every other keystone except resolve is going to be more powerful on her than most other champs.
Champs like bard will get 1 or 2 possible choices, where Vayne can have her pick of the crop.
a bonus item slot would be unbalanced im sure. im fixated on item interactions what if u got an upgrade token to remove the term unique passive from 1 item
